title: When you're 7/0/0 GP and your team informs you...
body:
... that the team score is 7/27/0 and it's entirely up to you to carry the rest of the match.

http://i.imgur.com/NviyxDR.gif

{{champion:41}} "YOU HAVE FAILED THIS CI- I mean... we got this guys!"
{{champion:62}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:99}} \*Avoid eye contact\*

P.S. If anyone can tell me why the gif is only showing as an icon, please do. Speaking of which, CLICK THE THING!

replies.body:
Let's see..

 http://i.imgur.com/evWZHB9.gif

Well, that's interesting.

>_MATT DAMON IS..._
>_... MARIAH CAREY: BEARDED PIRATE EXTROARDINAIRE_

... Yeah I'd go see that...

Or when your {{champion:103}} afks and you have to 4v5 and you are fed as {{champion:122}}, but then enemy team {{champion:69}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:39}} kites you like professional ballet dancers.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2211193466/210175110?tab=overview 

Needed a cold shower after that.

http://giphy.com/gifs/agony-affliction-5AVgmIw7iAzdK

{{champion:53}} : Professional Ballet Dancer. 

Also...

{{champion:81}} : Professional Ballet Dancer. 

I'll let everyone just... ponder those thoughts for a while...

{{champion:53}} ExCUUUUUSE me?

P.S. Why hasn't this been shipped yet?
I haven't played GP since he was updated. Still fun? I'm told that barrel stuff is a huge headache.

GP main here

Very fun, I consider him strong, but not meta. Nerfs have really hurt him and the removal of Crit from Triforce as well

But really good for scaling into the mid and lategame while being fairly safe from anyone not named Irelia or Tryndamere

some patches ago was awesome
but since those nerfs to his barrels is... meh
This has happened to me so many times being a top laner ({{champion:14}}) but there tank feeds so i mow them down with my ult yet for SOME REASON bot lane wants to surrender anyway (no salt detected)

Momma said there would be days like this

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2211273314/46248746?tab=overview

yeah.. and who needs dragons
At least GP honestly has that kind of carry potential ... Some of us play tanks ...
Try putting the http:// at the front of the link for the gif perhaps.

> [{quoted}](name=GetMariahCarried,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rQcwnBGg,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-09T14:40:44.754+0000)
>
> ... that the team score is 7/27/0 and it&#039;s entirely up to you to carry the rest of the match.

And non quoted http://i.imgur.com/evWZHB9.gif

...ok I have no idea
